about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse
matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or
general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a
direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian
factorization.
about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver

name: mumps-mpi
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.8
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: mumps-mpi
    version: 5.1.2
source:
    fn: MUMPS_5.1.2.tar.gz
    patches:
        - examples-mpilibs.patch
        - shared-libseq.patch
        - shared-mumps.patch
        - shared-pord.patch
    sha256: eb345cda145da9aea01b851d17e54e7eef08e16bfa148100ac1f7f046cd42ae9
    url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/MUMPS_5.1.2.tar.gz
build:
    number: 1006
    run_exports:
        - mumps-mpi >=5.1.2,<5.1.3.0a0
    script: ${RECIPE_DIR}/build-mpi.sh
    string: h82da4f8_1006
requirements:
    build:
        - cctools 895 h7512d6f_0
        - clang 4.0.1 h662ec87_0
        - clang_osx-64 4.0.1 h1ce6c1d_11
        - compiler-rt 4.0.1 h5487866_0
        - gfortran_osx-64 4.8.5 h22b1bf0_8
        - ld64 274.2 h7c2db76_0
        - libcxx 4.0.1 h579ed51_0
        - libcxxabi 4.0.1 hebd6815_0
        - libgfortran 3.0.1 0
        - llvm 4.0.1 hc748206_0
        - llvm-lto-tapi 4.0.1 h6701bc3_0
    host:
        - libblas 3.8.0 4_hd44dcd8_netlib
        - libcxx 4.0.1 h579ed51_0
        - libcxxabi 4.0.1 hebd6815_0
        - libgfortran 3.0.1 0
        - liblapack 3.8.0 4_hd44dcd8_netlib
        - metis 5.1.0 h0a44026_1003
        - mpi 1.0 openmpi
        - openblas 0.3.3 hdc02c5d_1001
        - openmpi 3.1.3 h71abe9c_1001
        - parmetis 4.0.3 h0b1c63e_1002
        - ptscotch 6.0.6 h1972921_1002
        - scalapack 2.0.2 he2915dd_1004
        - scotch 6.0.6 hde27766_1002
        - zlib 1.2.11 h1de35cc_1004
    run:
        - libblas >=3.8.0,<4.0a0
        - libgfortran >=3.0.1,<4.0.0.a0
        - liblapack >=3.8.0,<3.9.0a0
        - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
        - mumps-include 5.1.2 h3277127_1006
        - openmpi >=3.1.3,<3.2.0a0
        - openmpi >=3.1.3,<3.2.0a0
        - parmetis >=4.0.3,<4.1.0a0
        - ptscotch >=6.0.6,<6.1.0a0
        - ptscotch >=6.0.6,<6.1.0a0
        - scalapack >=2.0.2,<2.1.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.6,<6.1.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.6,<6.1.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test ! -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq*"
        - test ! -d "${PREFIX}/include/mumps_seq"
about:
    description: 'MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for
        solving

        systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse

        matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or

        general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a

        direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian

        factorization.

        '
    doc_url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/index.php?page=doc
    home: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/
    license: CeCILL-C
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: 'MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - jbweston
        - minrk

MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving

about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver
